review.classdesign.jammy.core

Class ProblemSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • review.classdesign.jammy.common.NamedObject
      • review.classdesign.jammy.core.ProblemSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class ProblemSolver
extends NamedObject
    A ProblemSolver is an object that for a given Problem instance provides :
    • An associated IFile which correspond to the solver source code
    • An associated ProblemSampleDataset which contains testing input and output.
    Author:
    fv
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • createSolver

        private static ProblemSolver createSolver(Problem problem,
                                          org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                   throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Static factory method that creates a ProblemSolver instance from the given problem instance. Creates project, solver, and dataset.
        Parameters:
        problem - Problem to build solver from.
        monitor - Monitor instance used for each builder involved.
        Returns:
        Created solver instance.
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - If any error occurs while creating solver.

      • get

        public static ProblemSolver get(Problem problem,
                                org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                         throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        ProblemSolver instances access method. If the required instance does not exist, or has been garbaged, then a new instance is created and put into the local cache.
        Parameters:
        problem - Problem to get solver instance from.
        monitor - Monitor instance used if solver creation is required.
        Returns:
        Retrieved instance.
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - If any error occurs while creating required instance.
